name: vImageRGBPrimaries
desc: A structure that represents the chromaticity of primaries defining a color space.

items.name: init(red_x: Float, green_x: Float, blue_x: Float, white_x: Float, red_y: Float, green_y: Float, blue_y: Float, white_y: Float)
items.desc: Creates a structure that represents the specified chromaticity of primaries defining a color space.

items.name: var red_x: Float
items.desc: The red x value according to the CIE 1931 color space.

items.name: var green_x: Float
items.desc: The green x value according to the CIE 1931 color space.

items.name: var blue_x: Float
items.desc: The blue x value according to the CIE 1931 color space.

items.name: var white_x: Float
items.desc: The white point x value according to the CIE 1931 color space.

items.name: var red_y: Float
items.desc: The red y value according to the CIE 1931 color space.

items.name: var green_y: Float
items.desc: The green y value according to the CIE 1931 color space.

items.name: var blue_y: Float
items.desc: The blue y value according to the CIE 1931 color space.

items.name: var white_y: Float
items.desc: The white point y value according to the CIE 1931 color space.
